ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] twisting 5
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Again - no substitute for good old fashioned human ingenuity.  What happens when you miss a note on one?  When twisting three, I can keep all three even if
ygData.messageBody:
At 05:20 AM 2/14/02 -0800, you wrote:
>--- Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...> wrote:
> > been playing Bard for 3 years now. I still barely manage 4. I prefer 3,
> > as it lets me think instead of just button mashing, and lots of times, that
> >
> >
> > >I have one song per hotkey, and I hit 1122334411223344...
>
>One can always write a macro...er...social button...like
>1[pause]12[pause]23[pause]...et cetera.


Again - no substitute for good old fashioned human ingenuity. What happens
when you miss a note on one? When twisting three, I can keep all three
even if I miss a note on one. A social would screw that up in a heartbeat.
- and of course, twisting four, I'd drop one a lot.

Talies
